page.title: 13TRANSPORT IN HARLOW
page.content: We sent out a questionaire on transport in Harlow {Bikes.}.83% of children own bikes most children walk to school but 3% come by bike, 18% come by car and 3% by bus.Most children ride their bikes between 1_2 hours but sometimes children ride 5 hours.Most families own between 2_4 bikes. 12% of families own 1 bike, 28% own 2 bikes,19% own 3 bikes, 20% own 4 bikes and 6% own 5 bikes. {Cars}84% of families have a car.62% of families have 1 car, 21% have 2 cars, and 5% have 3 cars.Most people who have a car travel more than 8000 miles a year(40%) but 28% of people travel less than 1000 miles. {Buses and trains}Although there is a good bus service only 27% of people in Harlow use it.40% of people use a train and mainly travel to London.
